about_the_game:
💔 "It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"

Meet Tesu, a lifelong single simp,a man with zero romantic experience for 30 years. His life is stuck in a monotonous routine, moving between work and home. As time passes, his chances for romance keep slipping away… and he doesn't even have a friend to set him up on a blind date.

💭 "Am I really going to be alone forever…?"

One day, the lifelong single simp stumbles upon a dating app! Could this be his chance to finally find love? 💘 But things aren’t as easy as he hoped.

🤔 A man with zero dating experience...

He has no idea how to start a conversation or what to say. His "dating knowledge" is limited to random posts he’s read online. 😢 On dating apps, he has to win someone over quickly, but with his current abilities, he’s falling short.

💡 But there’s still hope for him.

The cutting-edge AI romance advisor, "Juizy"!

Juizy connects with you and gives Tesu the best dating advice based on the situation. From smooth flirting, choosing the right topics, making decisions in awkward moments, to pulling off the perfect charm… But, there's a shocking secret hidden within 'Juizy'...

👉📱❤️ "Welcome to the dating app."

Can the lifelong single simp follow your advice? Your choices will determine whether he survives the dating jungle or crashes and burns.

This might be the biggest challenge of his life, and possibly his last chance.

Help him level up his romance skills and change his destiny!

[How to Play]

1. Dating App Interaction

You are connected with the lifelong single simp through Juizy. Help him send hearts and match with potential partners on the app! When a match happens, a video call will begin.

2. Choosing Responses

The lifelong single simp will struggle with how to respond during conversations. Your job is to choose the best advice for him. Your choices will determine if he wins her affection or faces rejection.

3. Leveling Up on a Dating App

The lifelong single simp starts at the lowest romance tier—Bronze. Build affection, gain romance points, and help him rise through the tiers, aiming to reach the coveted Gold tier! With your advice, his romance score could soar—or crash terribly.

When the lifelong single simp reaches Gold tier, a new world of possibilities may open up in front of him.

[Game Features]

  • The immersive experience of using a real dating app

  • Real-time interactions with the lifelong single simp through Juizy’s guidance

  • Stories of characters with different charms

  • The thrill of leveling up a lifelong single simp to the highest dating predator

Will you change the course of his desperate life?

Experience a real-life dating app simulation where your choices matter!


“Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App”

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sensitive content, including sexual conversations with certain characters. While most interactions are suggestive, some may feature explicit dialogue. Additionally, some images may depict revealing outfits. Player discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 11 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13 Ventura or above
  • Processor: Apple M1 or above
  • Memory: 11 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card or M-series integrated graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Dual core 2.6 ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTS 450 or better
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5 series +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTS 450 or better
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
